abstract: Provide a preferred initial scene style for an immersive space scene.
overview:
## Discussion

Use [doc://com.apple.bundleresources/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/UIApplicationSceneManifest/UISceneConfigurations/UISceneSessionRoleImmersiveSpaceApplication/UISceneInitialImmersionStyle] to configure the initial style for the system to use to create an immersive space scene for your app.

# UISceneInitialImmersionStyle

**Property List Key**

Provide a preferred initial scene style for an immersive space scene.

## Discussion

Use [doc://com.apple.bundleresources/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/UIApplicationSceneManifest/UISceneConfigurations/UISceneSessionRoleImmersiveSpaceApplication/UISceneInitialImmersionStyle] to configure the initial style for the system to use to create an immersive space scene for your app.
title: UISceneInitialImmersionStyle
